charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Kali and Valerie
deep in conversation.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0300:
Yes! I’d like a furisode that’s inspired
by my partner Pokémon so we can
better understand each other’s feelings!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0400:
That’s a good idea... But I think you should design
that yourself, Kali.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0600:
You’re the one who knows the most about
Azumarill, right?
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0700: I-I know, but... I’m not confident enough yet...
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0800:
Sorry to do this mid conversation... I have
plans coming up, so I must leave. Please
forgive my rudeness.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_0900:
I need someone to take my place...
Oh! Is that [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_1000: Can I leave Kali with you for a bit?
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_1500:
Well then, see you later, you two. I’ll be cheering
you on.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1101_1600:
After Valerie left, Kali began to
mumble nervously...
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_1700:
At my current skill level, I wonder if I’ll be able to
make a design I’d be happy with...
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_0402_2100: That’s right. I can’t give up before I start.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_2200:
Um... Then, could I formally ask you to help me
design my furisode?
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_2300:
Valerie is always thinking about what’s best
for us.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_2400: And she asked you to take care of me.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_2500: That means she trusts you very much.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_2600:
So, I think with you, I can make a furisode that I’d
be proud of!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_0401_2800: Yes! I feel slightly more confident!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_0302_2900:
Even if we mess up, let’s learn
from it!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_0402_3000: That’s right! Experience is everything, right?
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3100:
Maybe I was comparing myself with Valerie and
putting myself down...
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3200:
Even if my skills aren’t perfect, I’ve got to do what
I can, especially for my partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3300:
Because of you, I can move forward with this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3400: I can see why Valerie thinks so highly of you.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3600:
I am the one who tests who has the skills to
challenge Valerie.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3700:
But she’s already approved of you, even though
you haven’t battled me.
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_3900: Also, I’d like to get to know you better!
charaepi_ch0653_68_kirika/2301_1201_4500:
I’m gonna show you a battle so beautiful, you
won’t be able to describe it with mere words!
